text: Thomas Butler or Boteler (1513/14 – 1579), of Bewsey and Warrington, Lancashire, was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Lancashire in March 1553 and 1571. ==References== Category:1513 births Category:1579 deaths Category:People from Warrington Category:English MPs 1553 (Edward VI) Category:English MPs 1571 Category:Members of the Parliament of England (pre-1707) for Lancashire
title: Thomas Butler (16th-century MP)
